data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Bharuch, Gujarat, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bharuch, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Bharuch, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Bharuch, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Bharuch, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Bharuch, Gujarat, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,533,939 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Brahmin Audich people.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Bharuch unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
There are 1,551,000 people living in the county of Bharuch. Only about 17,061 might be believers.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Bharuch, Gujarat, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
